original_text: Then Moses turned to the Lord and said, “O Lord, why have you done evil to this people? Why did you ever send me?
korean_text: 모세가 여호와께 돌아와서 아뢰되 주여 어찌하여 이 백성이 학대를 당하게 하셨나이까 어찌하여 나를 보내셨나이까

sentences.original_text: Then Moses turned to the Lord and said
why have you done evil to this people?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 주께서 이 백성에게 악을 행하셨나이까?

sentences.original_text: Why did you ever send me?
